analyzed: ārya advayaśatikā prajñāpāramitā sūtra

original: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharatisma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena
analyzed: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharatisma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣu saṃghena

original: tatra khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃmāmantrayate sma /

original: ye kecit subhūte śrāvakamārgaḥ śikṣitukāmena prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgṛhītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyādeśayitavyā paryavāptavyā /
analyzed: ye kecid subhūte śrāvaka mārgaḥ śikṣitu kāmena prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgṛhītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā ādeśayitavyā paryavāptavyā

original: ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāmupāyakauśalya samanvāgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvabuddhadharmasamudāgamāya yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: iha eva prajñāpāramitāyām upāya kauśalya samanvāgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarva buddha dharma samudāgamāya yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: ye kecit subhūte kuśaladharmā bodhipakṣāḥ śrāvakadharmā vā pratyeka buddhadharmā vā bodhisatvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā /

original: bodhipakṣāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisatvadharmāstvaṃ te prajñāpāramitāyāmantargatāmanupraviṣṭāḥ saṃgrahasamavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti
analyzed: bodhi pakṣāḥ śrāvaka dharmāḥ pratyekabuddha dharmāḥ bodhisatva dharmāḥ tvam te prajñāpāramitāyām antargatām anupraviṣṭāḥ saṃgraha samavasaraṇam gacchanti

original: bhagavānāha - tadyathā subhūte dānapāramiutā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā /

original: yatra hi nāma kuśaladharmā bodhipakṣāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ pratyekabuddhadharmā bodhisatvadharmā buddhadharmā iti /
analyzed: yatra hi nāma kuśala dharmāḥ bodhi pakṣāḥ śrāvaka dharmāḥ pratyekabuddha dharmāḥ bodhisatva dharmāḥ buddha dharmāḥ iti

original: duradhimocā prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena parītakuśalamūlena durmedhasa anāvilena subhūtinā /

original: tasmāttarhi subhūte adhyāśayena bhikṣavo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhikāmenābhijñyaprajñāpāramitā udgṛhītavyā /

original: idamavocad bhagavānnāttamanā sā ca sarvāvatī parvadīyaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandanniti //
